DOC.brief_title: Hysteroscopy Before Vitro Fertilization - Does Improve Outcome ?
DOC.detailed_description: Background A tenth population Denmark today result assist fertility , include IVF ICSI . In roughly 40 % subfertile woman reason unknown . Standard initial procedure include transvaginal ultrasonography , without saline infusion detect intrauterine abnormality might explain infertile condition . The golden standard detect intrauterine abnormality hysteroscopy . Such abnormality detect fourth population . Earlier study indicate hysteroscopy alone - without correct abnormality , affect IVF/ISCI outcome positively . Aim By randomize patient referred fertility clinic Â±office-hysteroscopy circle prior IVF/ISCI , aim enlighten whether mini-hysteroscopy endometrial biopsy increase fertility look pregnancy rate main outcome . Method Women sign second IVF/ISCI treatment recruit , sign consent randomize either office-hysteroscopy nothing standard treatment fertility clinic . Mini-hysteroscopy standard procedure gynecological outpatient clinic . The procedure do without anesthetic . Only woman normal intrauterine condition enrol protocol . When fertility clinic positive serum-HCG ( human chorionic gonadotropin ) positive transvaginal sonography , pregnancy confirm . If negative serum-HCG , negative pregnancy register .
DOC.criteria: Women submit IVF ISCI treatment Age > 18 year Women able read , speak understand Danish Written consent Intrauterine abnormalities Infection BMI > 35 Known intrauterine cause infertile condition Abuse alcohol drug Untreated medical condition Pregnancy
